meanings.definition: The part of a person's mind that acts as a self-critical conscience, reflecting social standards learned from parents and teachers.
meanings.sent1: Her superego reminded her to always do the right thing.
meanings.sent2: The superego guides individuals to follow moral principles.
meanings.sent3: When his superego started lecturing him, he knew he had made a mistake.
meanings.sent4: The superego is like a strict teacher inside your head, always watching.
meanings.sent5: The superego is the inner voice that tells you what is right and wrong.

meanings.definition: The moral and ethical component of the personality that represents the ideal self.
meanings.sent1: His superego strives for perfection in all his actions.
meanings.sent2: The superego aims to uphold high moral standards.
meanings.sent3: Even his superego was impressed by his kindness towards others.
meanings.sent4: The superego is the compass that guides one towards moral excellence.
meanings.sent5: The superego is the moral compass that keeps us on the right path.
